deprecation.reason: Automatic index creation is no longer supported.

properties.name: spring.data.neo4j.embedded.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable embedded mode if the embedded driver is available.

deprecation.reason: Embedded mode is no longer supported, please use Testcontainers instead.

properties.name: spring.data.neo4j.open-in-view
properties.description: Register OpenSessionInViewInterceptor that binds a Neo4j Session to the thread for the entire processing of the request.

properties.name: spring.data.neo4j.repositories.type
properties.description: Type of Neo4j repositories to enable.

properties.name: spring.data.neo4j.uri
properties.description: URI used by the driver. Auto-detected by default.

properties.name: spring.data.neo4j.use-native-types
properties.description: Whether to use Neo4j native types wherever possible.

deprecation.reason: Native type support is now built-in.
